title: Rick Gets Hooked, Biden Gets Cooked | Daily Best of May 2 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Rick hooks a fish, but then the fish hooks Rick! Trevor Noah headlines the White House Correspondents' Dinner, and Biden laughs because "gas is up, rent is up, food is up!" How hilarious. We look at unbelievable footage of a destructive tornado going through Andover, Kansas. Wynonna and Ashley Judd accepted an award on behalf of their late mother Naomi Judd, who passed away one day before her induction into the Country Music Hall of Fame. And Producer Adler recaps his trip to the IndyCar Grand Prix of Alabama with his family.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
